examples.example: 通过这半年的努力，我的成绩有了显著的提升。

translate.english: Through the efforts of this half year, my grades have improved significantly.

examples.example: 经过半年的筹备，这场盛大的活动终于完美开展。

translate.english: After half a year of preparation, this grand event was finally carried out perfectly.

examples.example: 这半年以来，我一直坚持锻炼，身体越来越健康。

translate.english: Since the past six months, I have been insisting on exercising, and my body is getting healthier and healthier.
